whyJoin.title: Why join myUsta?
whyJoin.description:
At myUsta, we connect homeowners with trusted professionals for all home and maintenance needs. From quick fixes to major projects, we make finding and hiring the right expert simple. Our platform empowers both customers and tradespeople with tools for seamless collaboration and quality results.

Get things done smarter with myUsta.

cost.question: How much does it cost to join myUSTA?
cost.answer: Joining myUSTA is completely free. There are no hidden costs.

howItHelps.question: How does myUsta help me find jobs?
howItHelps.answer: myUSTA connects you directly with clients actively searching for tradespeople in your field and area.

whoCanJoin.question: Who can join myUsta?
whoCanJoin.answer: myUSTA is open to all tradespeople, including plumbers, electricians, painters, carpenters, and many more.

launch.question: When will myUsta launch?
launch.answer: The launch date is coming soon. Sign up now to join the waitlist and stay updated!
